content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at the specified position, but it currently has no fuel and no ingredients to smelt.
# I need to add the copper ore to the furnace for smelting into copper plates.

# I will now transfer the copper ore from my inventory to the stone furnace to initiate the smelting process.
add_ingredient(furnace, Resource.CopperOre, quantity=10)  # Add all 10 copper ore to the furnace. 

# After adding the copper ore, I will check the furnace's status to confirm that it is processing the ore.
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")  # Check the status of the furnace after adding ingredients.
